Package io.permazen.core

Class Encodings

java.lang.Object
io.permazen.core.Encodings
public final class Encodings extends Object
A few Encodings that are used for various general encoding tasks.

All of the encodings defined in the class do not support null values.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final ObjIdEncoding
    OBJ_ID
    Encodes ObjIds.
    static final StringEncoding
    STRING
    Encodes non-null Strings.
    static final UnsignedIntEncoding
    UNSIGNED_INT
    Encodes unsigned integers via UnsignedIntEncoder.
